item.description:
Free Networking Opportunity!

CADC, sponsor of the Out of the Box (OOTB) series, and Greater New Haven Meetups are joining forces for a free networking event at Southport Brewing Company (SBC) in Hamden, Connecticut.

Please join us for a night out and expand your professional network. The only cost is what you eat or drink while meeting colleagues and making new friends. Plenty of free parking, and easily accessible from the highway.

Thursday, March 26 from 6:30pm - 9:30pm
in the main bar

SBC Restaurant & Brewery - Hamden
1950 Dixwell Ave.
Hamden, CT 06514
(203) 288-HOPS
http://www.southportb...

From Interstate SR-15 Northbound
Take exit 60, right off ramp onto Ct-10 / Hamden. Turn right onto SR-10 Dixwell Ave. We'll be on the right.

From Interstate SR-15 Southbound
Take exit 60, right off ramp onto Ct-10 / Hamden .
Turn right onto SR-10 Dixwell Ave. We'll be on the right.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: CADC Out of the Box + GNH Design & Marketing at SBC
